duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate outside plant, inside plant cable, and Small Cell Network (SCN) construction projects, ensuring compliance with local and state permitting and licensing procedures.
Manage project timelines, budgets, and customer expectations for DAS and Small Cell projects, including fiber installation and utility make-ready.
Develop vendor relationships and participate in the bid process, influencing customers to award service work to the company.
Order and manage equipment and materials for projects, and provide oversight to general contractors aligned to job specifications.
Maintain project tracking system with complete accuracy and serve as an escalation point to engage General Contractors on corrective actions.
Observe and learn from Network Construction Managers working with Project Managers, Fiber Engineers, and Customers.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required
